apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with heart: woman, person, medium-dark skin tone, medium-light skin tone emoji beautifully illustrates a loving pair, with one figure possessing medium-dark skin and the other medium-light skin, united by a bright red heart floating between them. Apple’s characteristic 3D shading and smooth gradients imbue the emoji with a sense of joy and togetherness, while the heart’s glossy sheen emphasizes their bond. This emoji on Apple devices is a charming way to signify a romantic relationship, partnership, or a strong, loving connection.
